title: LAVANILA The Healthy Deodorant 2.0 oz Grapefruit Deodorant
description: What it is:A clinical-strength deodorant that is 100% natural, safe, and effective.What it is formulated to do:LAVANILA The Healthy Deodorant uses beta-glucan technology to effectively fight odor while soothing, conditioning, and strengthening the skin. It goes on clean, with no sticky wetness, and delivers long-lasting, luxurious results.What it is formulated WITHOUT:- Parabens- Sulfates- Synthetic Dyes- Petro-Chemicals- PhthalatesWhat else you need to know:This dermatologist-recommended, non-irritating, allergy-tested formula does not contain aluminum or mineral oils.

title: Cortex 4 in One Curling Iron Set
description: Cortex Professional 4 in 1 Ceramic Clipless Curling Iron Set uses advanced ceramic and tourmaline technology to create beautiful long lasting curls!

title: WEN by Chaz Dean Sweet Almond Mint Cleansing Conditioner 16 oz
description: Sweet Almond Mint is the perfect balance of nourishing herbs and natural ingredients designed to hydrate and replenish hair that has been damaged due to shampoo and other harsh elements. May be used as often as necessary, it thoroughly cleanses hair and scalp without stripping them of their natural oils, providing it with added moisture, strength and sheen.
